backupWallet.description: The backupwallet RPC safely copies wallet.dat to the specified file, which can be a directory or a path with filename.

destination.description: A filename or directory name. If a filename, it will be created or overwritten. If a directory name, the file wallet.dat will be created or overwritten within that directory

result.description: Always null whether success or failure. The JSON-RPC error and message fields will be set if a failure occurred
